data.actual_result: Server name is split across multiple lines, cutting off the top and bottom of the name.
data.short_description: If channel name, server name and category name combined is too long, server name is on multiple lines in quick switcher
data.steps_to_repro: - Have a channel with a long name - Have a category with a long name - Have a server with a space in the name - Have channel show up in quick switcher (either unread or as last channel or search for it)
